application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 49.1 (Early Works) of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area. Works include: the installation of temporary construction access route between early works site and Brent Terrace, excavation and removal of soil including breaking up of concrete and removal of hardstanding, dismantling existing retaining wall up to the interface between the former McGoverns Yard and Capital Concrete, drainage and utilities diversions, works for future temporary vehicular turnaround serving Plot 25
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London : Adjacent to the M1 junction with the A406. South of the A406, off Tilling Road. South East of the Brent South Shopping Park, next to Costa Coffee.
